properties.areaDesc: Rappahannock River from Urbanna to Windmill Point; James River from Jamestown to the James River Bridge; York River; James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 6 at 3:54PM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts
up to 35 kt and waves 1 to 2 ft expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, south winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt.

* WHERE...Rappahannock River from Urbanna to Windmill Point,
York River, James River from Jamestown to the James River
Bridge and James River from James River Bridge to Hampton
Roads Bridge- Tunnel.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 AM Friday to 1 AM EST
Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
